name: Skies The Limit
description:
This is a 3d platformer game that has been designed in mind for fans of early 90s low poly retro arcade games.

Once Upon a time the Gods wanted their creations to prove themselves to gain their favour, some wanted proof via faith & devotion whilst others chose proof via great acts in their name but two wanted a test that didn’t care which god people believed in, just that they had the spirit to face it. Thus they created The Tower. No one really knows what happens if you reach the top, because no one really knows if anyone has.

Gunnery Sergeant JD Flynn is the latest one to be chosen to take on this challenge of reaching the top of this ancient tower. A lone soldier who has lost much but not his faith in himself and his loved ones.
